nvidium.options.disable_chunk_unload.too: Disables chunk unloading, any chunk that is loaded will stay loaded and rendered, regardless of render distance
nvidium.options.extra_render_distance.to: Extra render distance added to existing distance, only useful if disable chunk unload is enabled
nvidium.options.max_gpu_memory.name: Max gpu memory
nvidium.options.max_gpu_memory.tooltip: Max gpu memory allowed, will start to cull chunks if this limit is hit
nvidium.options.fallback_allocation_size: Sets the fallback buffer size if sparse buffer is unavailable (this currently only happens on linux)
